name: 亚伯拉罕·林肯
bio: 美国第16任总统。出身贫寒，自学成才。内战期间领导联邦政府，发表《解放黑人奴隶宣言》，维护了国家统一，废除了奴隶制。1865年在福特剧院被刺杀，成为美国第一位被暗杀的总统。
bio_en: Sixteenth President of the United States who preserved the Union during the Civil War and abolished slavery. Born in a Kentucky log cabin, he rose from poverty to become a lawyer and congressman. His election in 1860 triggered Southern secession. The Emancipation Proclamation and the 13th Amendment ended slavery. Assassinated by John Wilkes Booth in 1865.
